page.title: 11The Rector page 1
page.content: Nigel Ovenden is Rector of Compton and Shawford parish.He became Rector on Ash Wednesday,1973. Previous to Compton,Mr.Ovenden was Rector of North Baddesley. He became Rector of North Baddesley in 1964.He believes that God called him to preach. When the Rector came to Compton he was delighted with what he saw.He says it is happy and convenient village. The Rector came to Compton after 10 years of preaching at north Baddesley. North Baddesley is 8 miles south east of Romsey.He says that the two parishes are quite different even though they are only a few miles apart. When a Rector or Vicar moves into a parish he is offered the Rectory or Vicarage free.If the house is not suitable he does not take the job.
